attributes.action: Ban Religious Speech In Public Places
attributes.additional_details:
Ban the attempted public conversion of Catholics, Christians, Muslims and other religions. Stop shouting in the street "the word of God" and stop trying to convert families and un-interested shoppers. If a Neo-Nazi or Satanist group was to do this, they would be arrested, so why not Christianity and Islam?

Sign this petition to keep religion, in religious places.
